name: Palace Of Elements
description:
A game about a girl exploring an old abandoned castle filled with puzzles. She found a magical staff that is useless on its own unless exposed to magic. And for some unknown reason, the castle has a lot of elemental energy inside

Go through labyrinths and find boxes in the ice or lava. Push them to platforms and teleport to the next level

It's the first game I ever made and it still needs a lot of work

Features:

  • Singleplayer
  • 7 Levels
  • Simple Sokoban mechanic
  • Go through barriers to gain magical abilities
  • Destroy walls on your way using a magical staff
